constituent: wisteria, flowers, edam, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, quarter, grains of rice
koohiiStory1: According to legend, the great Ogaki wisteria tree grew and flowered from magical rice grains that were planted under the quarter moon.
koohiiStory2: The wisteria is a type of hanging vine covered with flowers. By the light of the quarter moon, the flowers look like clusters of rice grains.
